title: Lot of 100 Assorted T206s  (Graded and raw)
author: A&G CR

posts.post_title: Lot of 100 Assorted T206s  (Graded and raw)
posts.post_content:
ot of 100 T206s including hall of famers
$3,200 obo
Amazing set starter to get your number up. Very few cards in bad condition. Includes hall of famers and PSA graded cards. Insane deal just about $32 a card
Any chance for a list of players, associated backs and some better pictures taken from a better angle?

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=1652318]Any chance for a list of players, associated backs and some better pictures taken from a better angle?[/QUOTE]

yea, a list of players and backs would help me also.

Agree with the above comments.  If it's too tricky to post pics, simply a breakdown of players, back and condition may suffice.  

With that said, if around half of the group is vg/ex or better I will take it at your asking price.  If not, I'd still be interested in purchasing all cards that fall into that condition category.  

Feel free to email me with details: [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
quick answer before I get back to everyone, all the cards on the hard cases are VG+ , all the cards in soft sleeves are Good, all the cards with no protection are Poor

Heres a list...

If no back is listed by me, its a Piedmont

Poor=Bescher, Fletcher, Ames, Ohara, Krause (SC), Ferris , Atz, Dunn, Crandall, Wagner, Knight, Milligan, Clancy, Ferguson, Fiene, Kisinger, Evans,

Good=Pickering, Beck, Bescher, Ball, Bridwell, Meyers, Delehanty, pfeffer, donohue, Geyer, clark, byrne, becker, Kruger, bush, plumley, Stanage (Polar Bear), hoffman, Schaffer (SC), phelps, payne, lennox, killian, powell, mullin, smith, rossman, jacklitsch, mccormick, tenney, hahn, white, myers, stephens, f smith, snodgrass, thomas

Very GOOD+=Seymour, grimshaw, sheckard, mcyintyre, carrigan, powers, mcgraw, duffy, leach, Groom (SC), chase, lord, mcbride, sheckard, Baker (Polar Bear), kleinow, purtell, downs, dygert, bergen, walsh, parent, pelty (SC), mcginnity, huggins, thomas, egan, bliss, lavender, frill (SC), barbeau (Polar Bear) Parent, Unglaub, Cree (SC), Rhodes, Milan, wright, street, needhma, elderfeld, grimshaw (SC), Howell

PSA 1 Kleinow (sovereign)

PSA 3 Ames SC

PSA 1 Jennings SC 350 460
last bump before I split it up
I'd be interested in any sovereign 350 apple green cards.

I'm interested in the poor cards if you split up.  


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
there aRE 17 poor cards email me an offer [url]kendemarco215@comcast.net[/url]

Just some friendly advice buddy.  It would probably be best to sell these individually with pics of each, and maybe offer discounts if purchased in multiples.  Rather than having them sit here, you would probably sell them in no time!  Good luck!
